name: Hide Mint Categories
description: Hide unwanted categories in the Mint.com transactions list. Includes full category list as of 5/19/2011. Please view More Info below for installation instructions.
additional_info:
When installing this style, please switch to Edit mode.

This css file is set up to exclude default categories from Mint.com. Each category is listed with its subcategories beneath it. Currently, no categories are excluded. To exclude a category, remove the comment markers from the FIRST part of the line only. Do NOT un-comment the description.

EXAMPLE: /*#menu-category-14,*/          /* Auto & Transport */
BECOMES: #menu-category-14,          /* Auto & Transport */

To exclude an entire category, you need only exclude the top category. For example, exluding #menu-category-10 will exclude not only Education but also Books & Supplies, Student Loan, and Tuition. Individual subcategories can be excluded, as well.

IMPORTANT: When implementing the CSS, be sure to have at least one category excluded before testing. The last item excluded must also end WITHOUT a comma. If no categories are excluded or the last item excluded ends with a comma, the page will not display correctly.
   
My thanks to edevinevt in Mint's user forum for the original code and the link to userstyles.org.
